description: R.J. Danvers & James Hamilton. These two big-dicked studs get the action going, climbing on board the RV for its maiden voyage. The scenery is spectacular but the guys are even hotter. After an introductory Q&A period, R.J. and Damien hop right to it, suckin and fuckin' until finally climaxing in each other's face.
title: Road Trip, Vol. 1: Russian River, Scene #01
